format24h.desc: Override default i18n setting. Use 24 hour time instead of AM/PM system, which is default.

options.desc: Sets the hours, minutes and seconds to be selectable. Hour, minute, and second are passed to a function that must return a Boolean. (Function(hr, min, sec) => Boolean)

hour-options.desc: Specify the hours that are selectable

minute-options.desc: Specify the minutes that are selectable

second-options.desc: Specify the seconds that are selectable

with-seconds.desc: Allow the time to be set with seconds

now-btn.desc: Display a button that selects the current time
